traits.name: Fiery Body
entries: A creature that touches the mjork or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
entries: The mjork sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

traits.name: Smoke Sense
entries: A mjork in contact with smoke has blindsight in that smoke's area in a radius of up to 120 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the mjork moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The mjork makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage and 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.
